pageContent: Purpose of review: Widespread prostate-specific antigen screening has led to an increase in prostate cancer diagnoses in Asian populations, reflecting changes in socioeconomic status and epidemiological features in these countries. In this setting, the present review explores opportunities for target focal therapy in Japan.
